tool_description: Manages healthcare provider profiles, credentials, specialties, and basic availability preferences for scheduling systems.

action.description: Action to perform: create, update, delete, or retrieve

provider_id.description: Unique identifier for the provider (required for update, delete, retrieve)

provider_name.description: Full name of the healthcare provider

error_messages: Invalid action: Action must be one of [create, update, delete, retrieve]
Missing provider_id: Provider ID is required for update, delete, and retrieve actions
Provider not found: No provider exists with the specified provider_id
Duplicate provider: A provider with this license_number already exists
Missing required fields: provider_name, specialty, and license_number are required for create action
usage: Specify the action and provide necessary parameters. For creating providers, include provider_name, specialty, and license_number. For other actions, include provider_id.

status.description: Success or failure status of the operation

message.description: Descriptive message about the operation result
